name: Kwinkles.GitHub.io
body: I am writing this blog to explore a bit with some hardware verification technologies that I don't yet know.  The plan is to design some basic hardware in Verilog, then test it with SystemVerilog and UVM.  The hardware won't be too complicated, as I am mostly trying to learn the ins and outs of UVM and the OOP features it provides.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
